item.title: 4 New CKEditor Plugins For Drupal 8
item.description: About a month ago I was testing a pull request (#1999) for Drupal Console that will generate boilerplate code to integrate a button plugin from CKEditor to Drupal 8. So apparently the integration to integrate a CKEditor plugin for Drupal 8 is very simple thanks to the great CKEditor API in Drupal 8. While testing this pull request (#1999) I ended up with 4 plugins in my computer and I decide to share the code in Drupal.
